Mantan Dirut PLN Sofyan Bashir Divonis Bebas Majelis Hakim PN Tipikor
04 Nov 2019, 15:37 by Suhanda


Mantan Dirut PLN Sofyan Bashir Divonis Bebas Majelis Hakim PN Tipikor

KBR,  Jakarta : Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2011) menggelar sidang Pembacaan Putusan kasus korupsi Proyek PLTU MT Riau I dengan terdakwa mantan Direktur Utama PLN  Sofyan Basir Majelis HAkim yang dipimpin Hariyono SH MH dengan hakim anggota membacakan putusan secara bergantian terhadap perbuatan perbantuan tindak pidana  korupsi yang dilakukan Sofyan Basir.Dalam Sidang Majelis Hakim menguraikan dakwaan dari Jaksa Penuntut umum KPK  yang mendakwa Sofyan Bashir melakukan Perbantuan tindak pidana korupsi."Terdakwa Sofyan Bashir tidak terbukti melakukan perbantuan sebagaimana dakwaan pertama pasal 12 huruf a Undang undang no 31 tahun 1999 tentang pemberantasan tindak pidana korupsi sebagaimana telah diubah oleh undang undang no 20 tahun 2001.
"Ungkap hakim Tipikor saat membacakan vonis di ruang sidang Muchtar Kusuma Atmaja PN Tipikor jalan Bungur Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Dalam Dakwaan kedua yang didakwakan JPU KPK terhadap Sofyan Basir yaitu pasal 11 Jo pasal 15 undang undang no 31 tahun 1999 tentang pemberantasan tindak pidana korupsi sebagaimana telah diubah oleh undang undang no 20 tahun 2001 tentang perubahan atas UU no 31 tahun 1999 Jo  pasal 56 ke 2 KUHP."Menimbang oleh karena majelis  hakim telah mempertimbangkan secara seksama  dakwaan  pertama dan majelis hakim memutuskan bahwa Sofyan Basir  tidak  terbukti secara sah dan meyakinkan  melakukan tindak pidana perbantuan maka dengan demikian majelis hakim majelis hakim  berkrdimpulan bahwa  Sofyan Bashir pun tidak terbukti  melakukan tindak pidana perbantuan korupsi seperti dakwaan pertama Jelas Majelis Hakim.ketua Majelis Hakim Haryono membacakan Amar putusannya majelis ang disambut gembira oleh keluarga dan pendukungnya."Atas pertimbangkan tersebut Ketua Majelis Hakim membacakan Amar Putusannya yang antara lain berbunyi : 
1. Menyatakan terdakwa Sofyan Bashir tidak terbukti secara sah dan meyakinkan bersalah tidak melakukan tindak pidana sebagaimana yang didakwakan  Jaksa Penuntut umum dalam dakwaan pertama dan kedua2 membeabaskan Sofyan Bashir karena itu dari segala dakwaan3 Memerintahkan terdakwa Sofyan Bashir di bebaskan dari tahanan 4 memulihkan hak hak terdakwa  dalam kemampuan kedudukan harkat dan martabatnya 5 memerintahkan Jaksa Penuntut umum KPK membuka blokir rekening Sofyan Bashir dan keluarganya, "'ucap Ketua Majelis Hakim Tipikor yang menyidangkan kasus Sofyan Bashir.

Former PLN Managing Director Sofyan Bashir Sentenced to Be Free of Justice for the Corruption Court Judge
Nov 04 2019, 15:37 by Suhanda


Former PLN Managing Director Sofyan Bashir Sentenced to Be Free of Justice for the Corruption Court Judge

KBR, Jakarta: The Jakarta Corruption Court on Monday (11/4/2011) held a hearing to read the Decision on the Corruption Case of the MT Riau I PLTU Project with the accused of the former Managing Director of PLN Sofyan Basir HAkim Assembly led by Hariyono SH MH with member judges reading out the verdicts in turn against the act of assisting corruption by Sofyan Basir. In the Session of the Panel of Judges outlining the indictment of the Prosecutor of the KPK who accused Sofyan Bashir of assisting in a criminal act of corruption. "Defendant Sofyan Bashir was not proven to have assisted as the first indictment of article 12 letter a of Law No. 31 of 1999 concerning the eradication of criminal acts of corruption as amended by law No. 20 of 2001.
"Said the Corruption Judge while reading the verdict in the courtroom of Muchtar Kusuma Atmaja of the Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
In the second indictment charged by the KPK prosecutor against Sofyan Basir, namely Article 11 Jo Article 15 of Law No. 31 of 1999 concerning Eradication of Corruption as amended by Law No. 20 of 2001 concerning Amendments to Law No. 31 of 1999 Jo Article 56 to 2 KUHP. "Considering that because the panel of judges had carefully considered the first indictment and the panel of judges decided that Sofyan Basir was not legally proven and convincingly committed a criminal act of assistance, thus the panel of judges concluded that Sofyan Bashir was not proven to have committed a crime of assisting corruption as the first indictment Clearly the Panel of Judges. Chairman of the Board of Judges Haryono read Amar's decision the panel was welcomed with joy by his family and supporters.
1. Declaring Defendant Sofyan Bashir not legally proven and convincing guilty of not committing a crime as charged by the Public Prosecutor in the first and second indictments acquitting Sofyan Bashir because of all the charges 3 Ordering Defendant Sofyan Bashir to be released from detention his dignity and dignity 5 ordered the KPK prosecutor to unblock the account of Sofyan Bashir and his family, "said the Chairman of the Corruption Court Judge who tried the Sofyan Bashir case.
